Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.observer.Observable<ModelObserver>
it.polimi.ingsw.psp1.santorini.model.Game
public class Game
extends Observable<ModelObserver>
Defines all functions that can modify the status of the game

      Returns:

    • moveWorker

      public void moveWorker​(Player player, Worker worker, Point newPosition)
      Used to move a worker on the map
      Parameters:
      player - the owner of the worker
      worker - the worker to be moved
      newPosition - the new worker position
      Throws:
      java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if you try to move a worker out of the map
      java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the given worker is not associated with the player

      public void startTurn()
      At the beginning of the turn checks if there is a winner or a player who has lost to be removed Starts player turn Notifies all clients
      Throws:
      java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if player list is empty
